articles.author: The Star Online
articles.description: Foreigners have poured a net $97 million into local stocks this month through March 22, while withdrawing a combined $1 billion from four other Southeast Asian markets tracked by Bloomberg.
articles.title: Turning point for Bursa beckons as foreigners pile in - The Star Online

articles.description: A new report that analyzed surveys that asked people to report occurrences of anti-Asian racism found 1,150 cases across Canada since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic. The analysis by the Chinese Canadian National Council revealed 60 per cent of the victims…
articles.title: Surveys find more than 1,000 self-reported incidents of anti-Asian racism since start of pandemic: report - CBC.ca
